Updated on July 30, 2018 Fosshub Terms of Service Legal Information &. Notices

We recommend you to read our Terms of Service section.
If you have any other question or concern, feel free to get in touch with us.

Table of Contents
  • FossHub Terms of Agreement.
  • Terms of Agreement violation.
  • Content that you will read/find on our website.
  • Request us to remove certain content.

FossHub Terms of Agreement

Welcome to FossHub (“we,” “our”) website ( www.fosshub.com ). Please read all these terms and conditions of use (“Terms of Service”) carefully before browsing our site. This agreement, which becomes effective when you access our site and remains in effect for an indefinite period, is legally binding. By browsing this website, you acknowledge and accept all the Terms and Conditions. We reserve the right to modify such terms at our sole discretion and without prior notice. If you do not accept these Terms and Conditions, please do not visit our website. Also, it is your responsibility to read the Terms and Conditions regularly. If you have a user account, you will be notified of any significant modifications to the Terms and Conditions.Your use of our Internet website ( available at this web address www.fosshub.com ) or any of the products or services offered on this site is subject to these Terms of Service (these "Terms"). We may modify these Terms at any time and without any notice. Your use of this website constitutes your binding acceptance of these Terms, including any modifications that we make.

At this time when you are reading this TOS - Terms of Agreement, we DO NOT COLLECT ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION ON THIS WEBSITE. WE ARE NOT INTERESTED IN COLLECTING SUCH PERSONAL INFORMATION - WE DO NOT COLLECT ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION OTHER THAN THOSE THAT CAN BE FOUND LISTED IN OUR PRIVACY POLICY, YOU MAY USE THIS WEBSITE IN A FULL AGREEMENT WITH OUR TERMS OF AGREEMENT AND AS LONG AS YOU RESPECT THE INTERNATIONAL LAWS. However, we will prosecute you to the full extent of the law in the case of any attack. Under no circumstances shall we be held liable for direct, indirect, special or punitive damages or for monetary loss, even if you have informed us in advance of the possibility, be it a remedy for contractual, extra-contractual or civil liability or any other legal theory resulting from or in respect of the use, inability to use or execution of services or products offered, and in information or messages posted on the website. This limitation of liability clause shall apply notwithstanding any limited remedy available at law.

If you suffer any prejudice or disagree, in any way whatsoever, with the provisions of the present Terms and Conditions, your sole remedy is to leave this website.The terms for this website are very simple so that everyone can understand them. We do not offer you any guarantees. We will therefore not be held liable for and do not provide any warranties as to the accuracy, currency, and completeness of any information contained on this website: ( www.fosshub.com ).

Terms of Agreement violation

FossHub does not allow the distribution of files that includes software designed to install other programs that can be identified as adware, spyware or malware. Any software title that attempts to execute malicious code, installs unauthorized software that has the potential to damage, steal, disrupt, or generate other illegitimate action on personal data, various hosts, or other networks is NOT authorized by FossHub and the software manager/author/ shall be responsible for any damage. To avoid infecting user machines and limit the damage, we reserve the right to remove immediately any reported binaries. If you want to report us a suspicious file, please state the name of the software and use the Contact form available on our website here: http://www.fosshub.com/contact.html

Terms and conditions listed under the "Abuse" section (see below) are also a part of FossHub Terms of Agreement violation.

Content that you will read/find on our website

Keep in mind that each technical advice is an opinion of our editorial team. We shall not be held responsible for following our advice, tips or indications. Our website contains a combination of content that is being created by us, by partners or publishers and by people that visits this website ( in some cases users will be able to post their own reviews/opinions ). All materials published on our sites, including, but not limited to, written content, photographs, graphics, images, illustrations, marks, logos, sound or video clips, and Flash animation, are protected by our copyrights or trademarks or those of our partners/publishers. Without limitation, we are not responsible for postings by users in the user opinion, message board, or feedback sections of our sites. You may not copy any or some parts of content found on our website ( www.fosshub.com ) without our permission.

Request us to remove certain content from our website

If you believe that content you own has been copied and made accessible in a manner that violates your intellectual property rights, you can always contact us by using the Contact us form options. We will delete any content that has been copied from another party as soon as possible. Since we also hate to see our content copied without our permission on other websites - we will immediately delete stolen/copied content from another source. (We never had any complaints).

Disclaimers for www.fosshub.com

We disclaim any responsibility for the deletion, the failure to store, the misdelivery, or the untimely delivery of any information or material. We disclaim any liability for any harm resulting from downloading or accessing any information or material on the Internet using search results from our sites. We disclaim any responsibility for, and if you subscribe to one of our fee-based services you will not be entitled to a refund as a result of, any service outages that are caused by our maintenance on the servers or the technology that underlies our sites, failures of our service providers (including telecommunications, hosting, and power providers), computer viruses, natural disasters or other destruction or damage of our facilities, acts of nature, war, civil disturbance, or any other cause beyond our reasonable control.

Abuse Section A.

You acknowledge and agree that you don't have the permission to use any manual or automated tools, programs that use automatic submission function or scripts that will scan our primary website www.fosshub.com or the other websites that we use to host our files (listed in Section B.) and post the results on the Internet. If you suspect an infection and wish to create a report, you must inform us (using our Contact Us page) and wait for an answer from us before you attempt to make the report public.

You acknowledge and agree that you are not allowed to post, collect, transmit, store, disclose and analyze any pieces of information related to www.fosshub.com or to any other website used by the same owner of www.fosshub.com (the list of all websites can be found at Section B. from this page).

Section B.

Please be aware that if you access our website (www.fosshub.com) or any other website that belongs to the same owner of (www.fosshub.com) and you're posting messages or posts (manually or automatically) that can hurt our image or business represented by www.fosshub.com, we reserve the right to take further legal action against you.

When you access www.fosshub.com or attempt to retrieve content or files that we host on our site or any other 3rd party service paid by us we do not allow the following (exceptions apply - read below):

- automate the download process using various tools or code (regardless of its type: open source or closed source) that can disrupt our service.
- attempt to download from FossHub infrastructure using a script, program or any other similar tool without our approval.
- any service that acts as a software updater tool, application, browser add-on, program, script that belongs to an individual, a company or any other entity that did not obtain our written consent or approval.
- any action performed by a script, computer program, tool, browser add-on that was created to interact with our website that did not obtain our written consent or approval.

Exceptions

If you wish to retrieve files from www.fosshub.com using an automated tool or script with the purpose of redistributing them on your internal network, download server, download mirror, CDN or any other similar service we might allow you to do this under the following conditions:

- Inform us about your intention before any attempt to interact with our website. If possible, provide us a sample of your code/tool to see how it is designed to work with our system.
- If you are the representative of a school, University or any other educational institution.
- If you represent a non-profit organization focused on education, health or any other worthy cause.
- A company that wishes to retrieve files from us but use its own replication system.
- Any other situation that wasn't added here but you consider it to be an exception.

Important: We reserve the right to deny certain requests if we think that will abuse our service or cause any other issues. Also, we reserve the legal right to request a financial compensation if you ignore our Terms of Service.

Section C.

We may modify these Terms of Agreement at any time and without any notice. It is your responsibility to keep yourself informed and accept our terms.

Section D.

Any person or company that has not been allowed to access collect transmit, store, disclose, make public and analyze any pieces of information related to www.fosshub.com and violates our Terms of Agreement acknowledge that we (www.fosshub.com) reserve the legal right to request a financial compensation.

You agree to indemnify and FossHub and its owners, directors, officers, shareholders, subsidiaries, affiliates, agents, and licensors harmless from and against all losses, expenses, damages, and costs, including attorneys' fees, resulting from your violation of these Terms of Use, including, without limitation, any use of this website other than as expressly authorized by these Terms of Use/Agreement.

FossHub.com is a free service, and therefore there are NO GUARANTEES . We (www.fosshub.com) cannot be held responsible for any consequences arising from the use of information or download of files (often described as software, programs, apps, tools created by other individuals or companies) obtained from this website. If you use or visit this website, it means that you've read and fully understood our "Terms of Service" and also our "Privacy Policy." If you do not agree with them, please leave this website immediately.

Updated on: Thursday, 24 May 2018

Updated on May, 24 2018 Privacy Policy We recommend you to read our Privacy Policy section.

If you have any other question or concern, feel free to get in touch with us.

Dear visitor, please read our Privacy Policy

We encourage all visitors ( users ) to read our PRIVACY POLICY and also our TERMS OF USE ( also known as Terms of Agreement ). By simply accessing this website you agree and you accept all of our terms and conditions and also our privacy policy that can be changed any time without any notification since we do not keep, store or manage any email address databases.
If you can read this privacy policy available for www.FossHub.com, it means that you agree with all the terms listed here. If you do not agree with our privacy policy you should leave this website immediately without visiting any other website page.
To help you make decisions about the information you provide anywhere on this site, this notice has been provided to outline our practices.
You should know that we respect your privacy, and we will never sell your information to anyone.
Also, we hate spam as much as you do, so you will only ever get an email from us that you have asked for and we have personally approved.
We use secure hosting accounts and other security measures to protect our database and any information provided.
Any e-mail you receive from this site will be sent as an answer to a question of yours made via the contact form or an old contact. We do not keep an email database.

Tracking

We don’t directly track your presence on this website. Your IP address is logged and we look at the server logs on occasion, but this is in an aggregate fashion for the purpose of determining why people come to visit us.
Example
The websites that link to us and send traffic here, and what keywords people use to find us via search engines such as Google, Yahoo, and MSN.
We do not build or associate such data to create a user profile or to track you.
Also, we do not share or sell such data. To make sure that we stay transparent, we remove the logs that are stored automatically at a certain period of time. We do not store such logs for a long period.

Cookies (Third-Party Cookies that do not belong to FOSSHUB)

Please note that FOSSHUB opted to show only "Non-personalized ads" to European visitors. You can read more about Google EU User Consent Policy here.
“Cookies” are data sent to your web browser from a web server (such as Google) that can uniquely identify your computer and store information about user preferences. Most web browsers will accept cookies by default, but they can be set to reject cookies, either from all websites or from specific sites. You can also manually delete cookies from your web browser. These options are generally set through a “Privacy” setting in your browser setup.
You can choose to remove them through your browser settings.
Please click on the following links to adjust your browser settings:

Internet Explorer
Google Chrome
Mozilla Firefox
Safari

Some of these set web browser cookies. Google in particular quietly collects a tremendous amount of data on your browsing habits, and we participate in that data collection.

General information to all international visitors ( updated 16 August 2012 )

We would like to inform you that we are now using Google interest-based advertising technology. This technology is implemented by "us" www.FossHub.com using Google. This will not be used to identify you or your location, it will be used only to help our advertising system ( AdSense ) provided by Google to show more relevant Ads to our visitors.
We also use the DoubleClick DART cookie from Google. What is the DoubleClick DART cookie?
"The DoubleClick DART cookie is used by Google in the ads served on publisher websites displaying AdSense for content ads. When users visit an AdSense publisher's website and either view or click on an ad, a cookie may be dropped on that end user's browser. The data gathered from these cookies will be used to help AdSense publishers better serve and manage the ads on their site(s) and across the web."
"Google, as a third party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on your site.
Google's use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to your users based on their visit to your sites and other sites on the Internet."
"We use third-party advertising companies to serve ads when you visit our website. These companies may use information (not including your name, address, email address, or telephone number) about your visits to this and other websites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you. "
Besides Google AdSense we also use Google Analytics which may collect data. We can't say what kind of data is being collected, for more information you might want to check/read for their privacy policy or terms of agreement - please see the links below:

Google Analytics Terms of Service
Google Adsense Terms of Service

Visit this page frequently to check with our Privacy Policy
Proofreading kindly provided by Marisano James
